name: Pengüin
description:
Pengüin is a puzzle game where you should help our lovely penguin to escape from the ship where it's trapped. Each room is a challenging puzzle that hides the real truth about the situation it's facing our friend.

Made on the first UJI GameJam in ~40h.

Credits

  • Edgar Borrás -> Programmer
  • Adrián Carboneras -> Programmer
  • Mario Julià -> Programmer
  • Adrián López -> Programmer
  • Borja Villarino -> AI Programmer
  • Fran Sánchez -> Programmer & Project management
  • Oxana Voribieva -> Artist
  • and 2 anonymous guys :D
